scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc automation/prompt.ts automation/review-repo.ts --outDir dist/automation --rootDir automation --module ES2022 --moduleResolution bundler --target ES2022 --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='dist/automation/review-repo.js';fs.writeFileSync(p,fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8').replace('./prompt','./prompt.js'));"
